subject: Orange Bowl (Football Game)
Bowl Games
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Northern Illinois, despite a 12-1 record, is one of the most unlikely teams to reach a B.C.S. game, and the first from the Mid-American Conference.
snippet: Northern Illinois, despite a 12-1 record, is one of the most unlikely teams to reach a B.C.S. game, and the first from the Mid-American Conference.
